reviewText: Thank you Christy for a great product!
Good video for beginners.  Hard to follow if you don't have multiples of 4 for the squares.  But great video and instruction.

I always thought Square Dancing was corny, but after getting familiar with other products of Christy Lane's, I checked this out. Get a couple of friends and have a load of fun! This is a great way to learn...I'm going to do the whole series.
Good, simple, instructional square dance video. Really helped us to practice at home.  Recommend.
This tape is very good for someone who wants to begin square dancing and those who have experience. We had a lot of fun with it at a family party!
Wanted to see if I had any memory of Square dancing.  This is very basic but nicely done.

This VHS tape cassette is a nice introduction to Square Dancing but although 65 mainstream moves are mentioned in the description, a very few are actually covered.  We expected much more.  There certainly was enough room for more tape on the cassette to instruct many more moves and for the price, it should have been there.
